about_the_game:
Triangles is a game where you lay triangular shaped tiles next to each other on a grid. The numbers in the three corners of a tile must match the numbers of the touching tiles in that affiliated corner. You get points when you lay a tile down. If you can't play a tile, you must draw a new tile from the draw box. Each player starts with 7 tiles and the game ends when a player eliminates all of their tiles or the draw box is empty when a player tries to draw a new tile. The player with the highest score when the game ends is the winner.

When you buy and install this DLC, the mini-game will appear on the main menu as an option in the games list.
Click or touch the game in the games list to start a new game.

Touchscreen Support

Woohoo! - Game "Triangles" supports touchscreens. You can also use a stylus pen or your finger to select tiles and tile spots.
(Touchscreen-enabled laptop or tablet required.)

Multiplayer Support

Woohoo! - Game "Triangles" is a multiplayer game of two players. You can play against the computer/bot or against another human player.

To play against another human player, the other player must also own this DLC. One player hosts a game and the other player connects to the host player by their IP address. Two human players can't play together on the same computer.
